member.name: T:MirrorSharp.Advanced.IFastJsonWriter
member.summary: JSON writer used to communicate with MirrorSharp clients.
member.remarks: At the moment the output is not actively validated -- writer can produce invalid JSON if not used carefully.

member.summary: Opens a new JSON object ({).

member.summary: Closes current JSON object (}).

member.summary: Opens an new JSON array ([).

member.name: M:MirrorSharp.Advanced.IFastJsonWriter.WriteEndArray
member.summary: Closes current JSON array (]).

member.name: T:MirrorSharp.Advanced.IRoslynSession
member.summary: Represents a user session based on Roslyn.

member.name: P:MirrorSharp.Advanced.IRoslynSession.Project
member.summary: Roslyn associated with the current session.

member.name: M:MirrorSharp.Advanced.IRoslynSession.AddMetadataReferencesFromFiles(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds assembly references to the current session and attempts to discover corresponding XML documentation.
member.param: Paths to assemblies to be added.
member.remarks: This method will attempt to automatically discover XML documentation files for the assemblies being added. However it will always succeed, whether the XML documentation is available or not.

member.name: M:MirrorSharp.Advanced.IRoslynSession.SetScriptMode(System.Boolean,System.Type)
member.summary: Sets or unsets script mode for the Roslyn session.
member.param: Whether the session should use script mode.
Host object type for the session; must be null if is false.
member.remarks: Members of are directly available to the script. For example if you set hostObjectType is , you can use in the script by just writing Next().

member.name: T:MirrorSharp.Advanced.ISetOptionsFromClientExtension
member.summary: An interface used to implement custom (extension) options.

member.name: M:MirrorSharp.Advanced.ISetOptionsFromClientExtension.TrySetOption(MirrorSharp.Advanced.IWorkSession,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method called each time MirrorSharp encounters an extension option (x-*).
member.param: Current .
Name of the extension option; always starts with 'x-'.
Value of the extension option, as provided by the client.
member.returns: true if extension options is recognized; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:MirrorSharp.Advanced.ISlowUpdateExtension
member.summary: An interface used to implement periodic custom processing.

member.name: M:MirrorSharp.Advanced.ISlowUpdateExtension.ProcessAsync(MirrorSharp.Advanced.IWorkSession,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostic},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Method called by MirrorSharp periodically (e.g. each 500ms), if there were any changes.
member.param: Current .
Current diagnostics. can add extra diagnosics if needed.
A that MirrorSharp can use to cancel processing.
member.returns: Any object; result will be passed to .
member.remarks: If the return value implements , it will be automatically disposed after call.

member.name: M:MirrorSharp.Advanced.ISlowUpdateExtension.WriteResult(MirrorSharp.Advanced.IFastJsonWriter,System.Object,MirrorSharp.Advanced.IWorkSession)
member.summary: Called after ; writes its result to the client if required.
member.param: used to write the result.
Result returned by .
Current .
